UPDATE t_product
proName = #{proname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manufactureDate = #{manufacturedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

CREATED_TX_STAMP = #{createdTxStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE proID = #{proid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
